subject: Rain
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Based on reports from their weather sources, the Yankees expected that C. C. Sabathia would have thrown his first pitch at Yankee Stadium two hours earlier than he eventually did, at 10:32 p.m.
snippet: Based on reports from their weather sources, the Yankees expected that C. C. Sabathia would have thrown his first pitch at Yankee Stadium two hours earlier than he eventually did, at 10:32 p.m.
